title: 90/485/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 September 1990 repealing Decision 89/222/EEC and amending decisions 79/542/EEC, 89/15/EEC and 90/135/EEC as a result of the unification of Germany
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 September 1990
repealing Decision 89/222/EEC and amending Decisions 79/542/EEC, 89/15/EEC and 90/135/EEC as a result of the unification of Germany
(90/485/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Decision 89/222/EEC is hereby repealed.
2. The reference to the German Democratic Republic in:
- the Annex to Decision 79/542/EEC,
- the Annex to Decision 89/15/EEC,
- the Annex to Decision 90/135/EEC,
is hereby deleted.
This Decision shall take effect on 3 October 1990.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
